column2: This is a cumculative total of hours in a year that storm sewers belonging to wessex water were overflowing.
Not comparable to other Local authorities
This is a cumculative total of hours that storm sewers belonging to wessex water were detected to be overflowing.
No calculations were performed on this dataset and it is presented as found
